name: DR SUSHILA SANSAR CHAND ALMAST PUBLIC WELFARE TRUST
briefDescription: The Trust has the twin objectives: (1) Creating a Holistically Healthy India Through Preventive and Affordable Healthcare (2) Affordable healthcare services for the below poverty line (BPL) and for the economically weak (EWS). Under the first objective we do street plays, distribute posters and conduct health awareness camps. Under the second objective we conduct medical & surgical camps and plan to setup affordable Health Centers all over India under the name of " Sukhi Sansar Diagnostic Centers". The first such center is coming up in Delhi shortly. Other methods of achieving the twin objectives of the Trust are also under consideration.Number of people served could be in excess of 20000.

address: Raja Dhirsen Marg, ISKCON Temple Road
